response_requirements.initial_response_description: Must respond as soon as possible, no later than end of third business day following receipt. If immediate access not granted, must explain delay and provide anticipated availability date.
extension_conditions: Must explain reason for delay beyond immediate access and provide earliest date/time records will be available
response_requirements.no_response_consequence: File complaint with Attorney General or circuit court action for mandamus relief

fee_structure.standard_copy_fee: Maximum 10 cents per page for standard copies
fee_structure.electronic_fee: Actual cost of providing electronic copies (cannot exceed copy cost)
fee_structure.search_time_fee: Average hourly clerical rate using lowest-paid employee capable of fulfilling request. Cannot charge for first hour of research time.
fee_structure.notes: Actual cost for non-standard reproduction. Cannot charge for first hour of research time. Must use lowest-paid employee capable of fulfilling request.

exemptions.description: Legal actions and attorney-client privileged communications
Records that would violate individual privacy protection
Real estate transactions prior to disclosure or purchase

appeal_process.appeal_description: Direct complaint to Attorney General for guidance or circuit court action for mandamus relief. Court may void actions taken in violation.

penalties.civil: Civil penalties up to $1,000 for individuals, up to $5,000 for governmental bodies for intentional violations. Attorney fees may be awarded. Penalties only for knowing or purposeful violations.

requester_requirements.specific_format: Written request preferred. Be specific about records sought.
requester_requirements.notes: Any person may request. No residency requirement.

specific_obligations: Explain any delays with specific timeline
Maintain detailed records of requests and responses

oversight_body.name: Missouri Attorney General
oversight_body.role: Provides guidance and interpretation, investigates complaints, issues opinions, maintains public education resources
enforcement_powers: Issue opinions on Sunshine Law matters

primary_sources: Missouri Attorney General Sunshine Law guidance
validation_metadata.verification_notes: Parsed from official statutory text file. Response time verified against canonical-values.json (3 business days). 6 exemptions parsed from statute. Recently amended by 2025 H.B. 145 & 59.
